English: jejunum (empty gut, middle segment of small intestine between duodenum `十二指腸~|`十~`二~`指~肠[shi2 er4 zhi3 chang2] and ileum `回腸~|`回~肠[hui2 chang2])

d.f: `小腸~`的~`一段~，`上~`接~`十二指腸~，`下~`連~`迴腸~。
